name: Ext_R3_ProcedureRequest_reasonCode
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ProcedureRequest.reasonCode for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ProcedureRequest.reasonCode from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ProcedureRequest|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: An explanation or justification for why this diagnostic investigation is being requested in coded or textual form.   This is often for billing purposes.  May relate to the resources referred to in supportingInformation.
element.comment: `ServiceRequest.reasonCode` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.reasonCode` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: An explanation or justification for why this diagnostic investigation is being requested in coded or textual form.   This is often for billing purposes.  May relate to the resources referred to in supportingInformation.
element.comment: `ServiceRequest.reasonCode` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.reasonCode` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Diagnosis or problem codes justifying the reason for requesting the procedure or diagnostic investigation.
